Reason: The configuration option _journalAgeThreshold is performance-sensitive. This is because the value of _journalAgeThreshold directly affects the creation of a PersistentJournal object, which involves time-expensive operations like disk synchronization and monitoring. The value of _journalAgeThreshold can lead to notable performance variations at the system level by impacting the efficiency of journaling and disk operations, making it a critical factor in system performance.
